EmailTemplate.name: RE: Steven's deal (1385581120.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Steven's deal (1385581120.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Elaine, It’s nice to “meet” you via email. As Steve mentions below, MBO’s service is designed for independent consultants and small businesses <http://link.mbopartners.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFVPuk5iy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D#howwehelp> who choose to plug into the MBO Services Cloud making it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so IC’s can stay focused on delivering services. We have put together a short one page collateral <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. As a function of this service, MBO Partners will be invoicing for and accepting payments on Steve’s behalf. To get everything fully initiated, please fill out and return the below form as soon as possible: - Independent Consultant Statement of Work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Independent_Consultant_Statement_of_Work.pdf>– Please complete, sign, and return Additionally, the following links provide important information on MBO that you will find useful: - MBO Payment Information <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Wire_and_Payment_Information.pdf> - W-9 for MBO Partners <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_W-9.pdf> - Certificate of Liability Insurance <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Sample_COI.pdf> Please feel free to reach out to me with any additional questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you and reviewing your paperwork. Have a lovely holiday, Sara <http://link.mbopartners.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFVPuk5iy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. From: Steven Arhancet [mailto:liquid112@curse.com] Sent: Wednesday, November 27, 2013 2:31 PM To: Feinstein, Elaine Cc: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Steven's deal Elaine, It’s nice to meet you! I’ve cc’ed my Business Manager at MBO Partners, Sara Conde who will help with completing any of the paperwork on my end. You can feel free to send over the contract and any additional paperwork to the both of us to review, execute and send back. Regards, Steve Steven Arhancet Director of eSports, Curse Inc. www.teamcurse.net <http://www.teamcurse.net> From: Derksen, Lukas [mailto:lderksen@sidlee.com <mailto:lderksen@sidlee.com>] Sent: Wednesday, November 27, 2013 11:18 AM To: Steven Arhancet Cc: Feinstein, Elaine Subject: Re: Steven's deal Hi Steve, That's no problem for us. The only think we'd need is an invoice from MBO Partners for your monthly services and in the future, invoices every time we'd hire you according to your day rate. We can extend you POs for those and we'd be billing MBO as if it's one of our suppliers. I have CCed Elaine who will work out the logistics for this. Thnks SteveLD---------------------LUKAS DERKSEN---------------------MANAGING PARTNER NYCM: +1.718.938.4060Skype: lderksen1SIDLEE.COM <http://SIDLEE.COM>---------------------Sent from my iPhone On Nov 27, 2013, at 1:02 PM, "Steven Arhancet" <liquid112@curse.com <mailto:liquid112@curse.com>> wrote:Lukas, Just wanted to follow up on any paperwork that may need to be completed. If possible, I would like to have the payments go through my employer of record, MBO Partners. This way you guys can do a corp to corp with them and then they W2 me. Removes some risks for you guys and provides some benefit to me. They also track my hours, send invoices and handle all my tax stuff for me. If this is okay, I can forward the paperwork for them to execute on. I can be named in the SOW. Please let me know if you would like to discuss. Regards, Steve Steven Arhancet Director of eSports, Curse Inc. www.teamcurse.net <http://www.teamcurse.net> From: Derksen, Lukas [mailto:lderksen@sidlee.com <mailto:lderksen@sidlee.com>] Sent: Monday, November 25, 2013 4:27 PM To: Steven Arhancet Subject: Re: Steven's deal Awesome, thnks Steve! This is going to be fun. We'll send over the proper documentation tomorrow. ---------------------LUKAS DERKSEN---------------------MANAGING PARTNER NYCM: +1.718.938.4060Skype: lderksen1SIDLEE.COM <http://SIDLEE.COM>---------------------Sent from my iPhone On Nov 25, 2013, at 6:14 PM, "Steven Arhancet" <liquid112@curse.com <mailto:liquid112@curse.com>> wrote:Lukas, Looking forward to starting on this project, really enjoyed the kick-off call with your team. I’ll review any paperwork and reply quickly so we can aim to have everything completed by the 2nd. Regards, Steve From: Matt Wolf [mailto:mattwolf@coca-cola.com <mailto:mattwolf@coca-cola.com>] Sent: Monday, November 25, 2013 2:46 PM To: Derksen, Lukas Cc: Steven Arhancet Subject: Steven's deal Hi Lukas, I just got off the phone with Steve, he's good with the offer so let's proceed as follows… - 20 Hrs Month @$150hr. 6mo term with the option to renew. - $800 day rate- All travel and expenses need to be approved prior. You guys can take it from here. Many thanks, mw CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE NOTICE: This message is intended for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is confidential, privileged and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any printing, copying, dissemination, distribution, disclosure or forwarding of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please contact the sender immediately and delete it from your system. Thank You.
